body: @Crayxiel. the fast effect is not that unrealistic, scopolamine has anecdotally been applied as a powder blown into victims faces, i get immediately drunk from sniffing alcohol, and there are arrow poisons that act instantly. what is unrealistic is the incredibly specific effect. even though it says "i cant think straight", as it is shown in her actions afterwards, all it effectively does is turning her into a horny bitch for him, without appearing to impair her, seemingly indefinitely. although it might be not that incredibly unrealistic, since scopolamine has been documented, rather well as a medicine for women giving birth, to effect a seemingly lucid state only marked by an absence of unrest, initiative or free will, to be forgotten afterwards. still the given depiction shows way too much independence for that.

That being said, I can't help but think the climax is rather lazy. The appeal of rape is a pure girl's resistance and if you don't give that then it's a pretty bland rape doujinshi. That pill took affect way too fast making it hilariously unrealistic.
As long as maika has a doujinshi I don't care even if it is rape or ugly bastard. Just don't let it be something distasteful like necrophilia.
Finally a good maika design and bearable fat bastard ntr cucking pretty boy guy, yes yes yes yes yes

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse.
Marika X Dino not canon therefore not ntr
